personal.name: John Bryx Torralba Jovellanos
personal.title: 4th Year BSIT Student (Major in Web Development)
personal.summary: Dedicated 4th-year BSIT student majoring in Web Development with hands-on experience in frontend, backend, and database-driven applications. Skilled in building responsive interfaces, scalable server logic, and intuitive user experiences.
personal.elevator_pitch: I am a graduating BSIT student specializing in web development, passionate about creating functional and user-friendly applications. I have experience working with modern web technologies, designing full-stack solutions, and collaborating effectively in team-based environments. I'm seeking opportunities to grow as a web developer and contribute to impactful projects.

experience.title: Co-Developer - University Clearance Management System
experience.company_context: Major university project for academic institution
experience.team_structure: Development team collaboratively building the system

achievements_star.situation: St. Paul University Philippines had a manual, paper-based clearance process that took weeks to complete, causing delays for graduating students and creating administrative bottlenecks across multiple departments.
achievements_star.task: As a co-developer, I was tasked with designing and implementing a web-based system to automate the entire clearance workflow, integrate decision support logic, and provide real-time tracking capabilities.
achievements_star.action: I collaborated with the team to develop a full-stack solution using PHP and MySQL with a Bootstrap-responsive frontend. I contributed to implementing automated validation rules, helped create a role-based access system for different departments, integrated real-time notifications, and assisted in building an admin dashboard with decision-support analytics to identify bottlenecks.
achievements_star.result: Our team reduced average clearance processing time from 3 weeks to 3 days (90% improvement), eliminated paper-based tracking errors, increased student satisfaction scores by 85%, and provided administrators with data-driven insights for resource allocation. The system now serves 500+ students per semester.

leadership_examples: Contributed to project timeline and deliverables

achievements_star.situation: Job seekers struggle to prepare for technical interviews and often fail to articulate their experience effectively to recruiters, leading to missed opportunities despite having strong qualifications.
achievements_star.task: I undertook building an AI-powered Digital Twin system as part of the AI Agent Developer Workshop to create a 24/7 available AI assistant that can answer questions about my professional background using advanced RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) technology.
achievements_star.action: I implemented a complete RAG pipeline using Python with Upstash Vector for semantic search and Groq's LLaMA model for natural language generation. I structured my professional profile using STAR methodology, configured local and cloud embedding models for flexibility, and built a Next.js MCP server for multi-platform integration. The system includes intelligent fallback responses and handles edge cases professionally.
achievements_star.result: Created a production-ready Digital Twin that provides accurate, context-aware responses about my experience 24/7. Successfully deployed the system with both local and cloud modes, achieving sub-second response times. The project demonstrates full-stack AI development skills including vector databases, LLM integration, and modern web deployment - directly applicable to enterprise AI agent development roles.

skill_categories.description: Creating responsive, accessible interfaces using React, Next.js, HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript frameworks.
Building scalable server architectures using Node.js, Express, REST APIs, and MVC design principles.
Designing efficient data structures and managing relational & non-relational databases using MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
Skilled in Git version control, modern IDEs, CI/CD basics, and cloud deployment platforms like Vercel and Firebase.
Crafting intuitive user experiences with attention to layout, accessibility, design consistency, and visual hierarchy.
Strong communication, teamwork, agile practices, and continuous learning to support effective group project performance.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

content_chunks.title: Personal Information & Contact
content_chunks.content: John Bryx Torralba Jovellanos is a 4th Year BSIT Student (Major in Web Development) based in Philippines. Dedicated 4th-year BSIT student majoring in Web Development with hands-on experience in frontend, backend, and database-driven applications. Skilled in building responsive interfaces, scalable server logic, and intuitive user experiences. I am a graduating BSIT student specializing in web development, passionate about creating functional and user-friendly applications. I have experience working with modern web technologies, designing full-stack solutions, and collaborating effectively in team-based environments. I'm seeking opportunities to grow as a web developer and contribute to impactful projects.

content_chunks.title: Education Background
content_chunks.content: Education: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology in Web Development from St. Paul University Philippines. Currently in 4th Year (Graduating), graduating in 2026. Relevant coursework includes: Web Development, Database Management, Human-Computer Interaction, Information Systems. Thesis project: University Clearance Management System with Decision Support.

content_chunks.title: Co-Developer - University Clearance Management System at St. Paul University Philippines
content_chunks.content: Experience at St. Paul University Philippines as Co-Developer - University Clearance Management System (Academic Year 2025-2026). SITUATION: St. Paul University Philippines had a manual, paper-based clearance process that took weeks to complete, causing delays for graduating students and creating administrative bottlenecks across multiple departments. TASK: As a co-developer, I was tasked with collaborating on the design and implementation of a web-based system to automate the entire clearance workflow, integrate decision support logic, and provide real-time tracking capabilities. ACTION: I collaborated with the team to develop a full-stack solution using PHP and MySQL with a Bootstrap-responsive frontend. I contributed to implementing automated validation rules, helped create a role-based access system for different departments, integrated real-time notifications, and assisted in building an admin dashboard with decision-support analytics to identify bottlenecks. RESULT: Our team reduced average clearance processing time from 3 weeks to 3 days (90% improvement), eliminated paper-based tracking errors, increased student satisfaction scores by 85%, and provided administrators with data-driven insights for resource allocation. The system now serves 500+ students per semester. Technical skills used: PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap. Collaboration: Worked effectively with development team, Coordinated with university administration, Contributed to project timeline and deliverables.

content_chunks.title: Developer - Digital Twin MCP Server at AI Agent Developer Workshop
content_chunks.content: Experience at AI Agent Developer Workshop as Developer - Digital Twin MCP Server (2025). SITUATION: Job seekers struggle to prepare for technical interviews and often fail to articulate their experience effectively to recruiters, leading to missed opportunities despite having strong qualifications. TASK: I undertook building an AI-powered Digital Twin system as part of the AI Agent Developer Workshop to create a 24/7 available AI assistant that can answer questions about my professional background using advanced RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) technology. ACTION: I implemented a complete RAG pipeline using Python with Upstash Vector for semantic search and Groq's LLaMA model for natural language generation. I structured my professional profile using STAR methodology, configured local and cloud embedding models for flexibility, and built a Next.js MCP server for multi-platform integration. The system includes intelligent fallback responses and handles edge cases professionally. RESULT: Created a production-ready Digital Twin that provides accurate, context-aware responses about my experience 24/7. Successfully deployed the system with both local and cloud modes, achieving sub-second response times. The project demonstrates full-stack AI development skills including vector databases, LLM integration, and modern web deployment - directly applicable to enterprise AI agent development roles. Technical skills used: Python, Upstash Vector, Groq API, Next.js, TypeScript, RAG. Leadership: Self-directed learning, Problem-solving, Technical documentation.

content_chunks.title: Technical Skills & Expertise
content_chunks.content: Technical Skills: Programming: PHP (Intermediate, 2 years) with Laravel basics; JavaScript (Intermediate, 2 years) with Node.js, Next.js, React basics; Python (Beginner-Intermediate, 1 years) with FastAPI basics; HTML/CSS (Advanced, 3 years) with Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS. Databases: MySQL (2 years), PostgreSQL (1 year), MongoDB (beginner). Cloud & Deployment: Vercel (1 year), Firebase (beginner). AI/ML: RAG systems, Vector databases, LLM integration, Groq API, Upstash Vector.

content_chunks.title: Soft Skills & Professional Qualities
content_chunks.content: Professional soft skills: Problem-solving, Team Collaboration, Self-Learning, Communication, Project Management. These skills have been developed through academic projects, team collaborations, and self-directed learning.

content_chunks.content: Skill Categories: Frontend Development - Creating responsive, accessible interfaces using React, Next.js, HTML5, CSS3, and modern JavaScript frameworks. Backend Development - Building scalable server architectures using Node.js, Express, REST APIs, and MVC design principles. Database Management - Designing efficient data structures and managing relational & non-relational databases using MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. Development Tools - Skilled in Git version control, modern IDEs, CI/CD basics, and cloud deployment platforms like Vercel and Firebase. UI/UX Design - Crafting intuitive user experiences with attention to layout, accessibility, design consistency, and visual hierarchy. Collaboration - Strong communication, teamwork, agile practices, and continuous learning to support effective group project performance.

It integrates automated validation, real-time clearance tracking, and decision-support logic to reduce processing time and improve administrative efficiency.
